body_html:
The problem emerged in two other situations as well, here are the examples:

import torch
weights = torch.Tensor([0, 10, 3, 0])
print(weights)
torch.multinomial(weights, 5)
print(weights)

weights = torch.Tensor([0, 10, 3, 0])
print(weights)
torch.multinomial(weights, 0)
print(weights)

weights = torch.Tensor([0, 0, 0, 0])
print(weights)
torch.multinomial(weights, 2)
print(weights)

I'm sending a pull request with the fix. Thanks for reporting the problem. :)

body:
The problem emerged in two other situations as well, here are the examples:

```
import torch
weights = torch.Tensor([0, 10, 3, 0])
print(weights)
torch.multinomial(weights, 5)
print(weights)

weights = torch.Tensor([0, 10, 3, 0])
print(weights)
torch.multinomial(weights, 0)
print(weights)

weights = torch.Tensor([0, 0, 0, 0])
print(weights)
torch.multinomial(weights, 2)
print(weights)
```

I'm sending a pull request with the fix. Thanks for reporting the problem. :)
